statements: SELECT * FROM device_usage WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT device_id, usage_date FROM device_usage WHERE usage_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_usage FROM device_usage GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM device_usage WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY usage_date ASC, usage_time DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM device_usage
SELECT * FROM device_usage WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, SUM(usage_duration) AS total_duration FROM device_usage GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM device_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_id, location_id, COUNT(*) AS total_usage FROM device_usage GROUP BY device_id, location_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM usage_duration)) AS avg_duration_seconds FROM device_usage GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE usage_count > 10;
SELECT device_name, device_type, usage_count FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Computer' AND usage_count < 5;
SELECT * FROM usage_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND log_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'smartphone';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE usage_count > 100 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM usage_logs WHERE duration_minutes > 30 AND activity_type = 'browsing' ORDER BY log_date DESC;

SELECT device_name, SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM devices JOIN usage_logs ON devices.device_id = usage_logs.device_id GROUP BY device_name HAVING total_duration > 500 ORDER BY total_duration DESC;

SELECT devices.device_name, usage_logs.log_date, usage_logs.activity_type FROM devices JOIN usage_logs ON devices.device_id = usage_logs.device_id WHERE devices.device_type = 'laptop' AND log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, usage_data FROM historical_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, location FROM device_information;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM usage_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'daily';
SELECT device_id, pattern_description, pattern_type FROM usage_patterns ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_information WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device_information WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM historical_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, MAX(timestamp) FROM historical_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM device_information JOIN historical_data ON device_information.device_id = historical_data.device_id WHERE device_information.manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT * FROM DeviceActivity;
SELECT device_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM DeviceActivity WHERE activity_type = 'Maintenance';
SELECT device_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM DeviceActivity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, activity_type, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM DeviceActivity GROUP BY device_id, activity_type;
SELECT d.device_id, d.device_name, du.usage_category, du.usage_duration FROM DeviceDetails d JOIN DeviceUsage du ON d.device_id = du.device_id;
SELECT * FROM DeviceActivity WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT device_id, activity_type FROM DeviceActivity WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM DeviceDetails WHERE device_type = 'Phone' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, SUM(usage_duration) AS total_duration FROM DeviceUsage GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_duration > 1000;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocation WHERE location_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY location_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_usage_history ORDER BY usage_date DESC, usage_duration ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device_metadata WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM device_events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100
SELECT * FROM device_stats WHERE usage_count > 100 ORDER BY average_usage_duration
SELECT * FROM device_usage_history ORDER BY usage_date DESC, usage_duration DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, usage_duration FROM device_usage_history WHERE usage_duration > 60 ORDER BY usage_duration ASC
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM device_metadata ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM device_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM device_stats WHERE usage_count > 100 ORDER BY average_usage_duration DESC
